briefTitle: Open-label, Multi-center Protocol to Provide QTI571 to PAH Patients Who Participated in the Extension Study (A2301E1) in Japan
officialTitle: An Open-label, Multi-center Protocol to Provide QTI571 to PAH Patients Who Participated in the Extension Study (A2301E1) in Japan and Are Judged by the Investigator to Benefit From Continued QTI571 Treatment
summary: To provide continued treatment to Pulmonary Arterial Hypertension (PAH) patients who are benefitting from treatment with QTI571.
